name: Eggs & Blocks
description:
This is the most satisfying Bricks Breaker game ever!

Eggs & Blocks is a completely new take on block breaker games, combining classic bricks and balls mechanics with realistic, oddly satisfying lava physics effects! Enter the volcanic kingdom, and build a strong team of heroes to conquer those mighty volcanos!

Strategic puzzles, pools of hot lava, epic heroes, volcanic eggs, and much more awaits you! Come on in and join the quest!

• CONQUER epic volcanos!
• HATCH volcanic eggs!
• COLLECT hot lava!
• BREAK colorful blocks!
• BUILD your team!
• UPGRADE your weapons!

---

Support: https://valasmedia.com/support
Terms of Service: https://valasmedia.com/terms
Privacy Notice: https://valasmedia.com/privacy

Please note: This game is free to play and download but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Notice, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download this game.
